item.title: Milestone 3
item.description: DeNS Query Layer Development Milestone Outputs A package that listens to Cardano transactions that are related to DeNS and populates a relational database. This serves as the main query layer for other applications like DNS analytics (we expect this to be particularly useful for security-related applications) but also as the database from which traditional DNS service integration can take place. The package which listens to Cardano transactions that are related to DeNS and populates a relational database can be found here.

item.title: Milestone 4
item.description: DeNS Control Layer Development Milestone Outputs An 'offchain' (which is a bit more substantial here than in most dapps) component that can build DeNS transactions and can be exposed to users through CLIs, GUIs, and APIs. An offchain component that can build DeNS transactions exposed via a CLI is provided here. Minimally, a basic DeNS CLI utility that can be used to meaningfully interact with the protocol. The CLI utility is provided as a flake output here.

item.title: Final Milestone
item.description: Deployment, Documentation, Productionizing Milestone Outputs A deployment-ready package or container (Nix/Docker) is made available for users Such packages are all available with Nix as a flake output: dens-query-cli dens-transactions-cli dens-pdns-backend Docker images and a Compose file to run the system on the Preview testnet are available here and here respectively. Extensive tests, including golden tests where applicable/useful, are implemented for each of the DeNS components An integration test suite which verifies data is piped between each component correctly can be found here
